name: Backlog Refinement
description: Reviewing, detailing, and prioritizing upcoming user stories in the backlog.

name: Design Critique Session
description: Peer review of ongoing design work to provide constructive feedback and ensure consistency.

name: Sales Pipeline Review
description: Reviewing the sales pipeline, progress on key deals, and weekly forecast.

name: Marketing Campaign Sync
description: Sync-up on current marketing campaign performance and plan upcoming activities.

name: Architecture Review Board (ARB)
description: Discuss and approve major technical architecture decisions for new systems or features.

name: Bug Triage
description: Review, prioritize, and assign new bugs reported in the last week.

name: Executive Leadership Meeting
description: Strategic sync for the executive leadership team to discuss company-wide priorities.

name: Product Roadmap Planning
attendees: cpo, product_managers, cto, engineering_managers, vp_sales, vp_marketing
description: Strategic session to define the product roadmap for the upcoming quarter.

name: Quarterly Business Review (QBR)
description: Review of the past quarter's performance against goals and setting priorities for the next.

name: Lunch & Learn
description: An informal session where an employee presents on a topic of professional or personal interest.

name: Frontend Guild Meeting
description: A cross-team meeting to discuss new frontend technologies, best practices, and shared components.

name: Company Social Hour
description: Informal social gathering to relax and connect with colleagues after work hours.
